class Solution
{
public:
    int mod = 1e9 + 7;
    int v[4] = {1, 5, 10, 25};
    int waysToChange(int n)
    {
        vector<int> dp(n + 1, 0);
        dp[0] = 1;
        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
            for (int j = v[i]; j <= n; j++)
                dp[j] = (dp[j] + dp[j - v[i]]) % mod;
        return dp[n];
    }
};

struct TreeNode
{
    int val;
    TreeNode *left;
    TreeNode *right;
    TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
};

class Solution
{
public:
    vector<pair<int, int>> ans;
    unordered_map<int, int> mp;
    void dfs(TreeNode *node, int deep)
    {
        if (!node)
            return;
        if (mp.find(deep) == mp.end())
        {
            ans.push_back({node->val, deep});
            mp[deep]++;
        }
        if (node->right)
            dfs(node->right, deep + 1);
        if (node->left)
            dfs(node->left, deep + 1);
    }
    vector<int> rightSideView(TreeNode *root)
    {
        dfs(root, 0);
        vector<int> result;
        for (auto [val, deep] : ans)
            result.push_back(val);
        return result;
    }
};

class Solution
{
public:
    int numberOfSubarrays(vector<int> &nums, int k)
    {
        unordered_map<long long, int> mp;
        mp[0] = 1;
        int sum = 0, ans = 0;
        for (int i = 1; i <= nums.size(); i++)
        {
            sum += nums[i - 1] & 1;
            ans += mp[sum - k];
            mp[sum]++;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

å¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä» s2 ä¸­åˆ é™¤æŸäº›å­—ç¬¦ä½¿å…¶å˜ä¸º s1ï¼Œåˆ™ç§°å­—ç¬¦ä¸² s1 å¯ä»¥ä»å­—ç¬¦ä¸² s2 è·å¾—ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œæ ¹æ®å®šä¹‰ï¼Œ“abc” å¯ä»¥ä» â€œabdbecâ€ è·å¾—ï¼Œä½†ä¸èƒ½ä» â€œacbbeâ€ è·å¾—ã€‚

ç°åœ¨ç»™ä½ ä¸¤ä¸ªéç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸² s1 å’Œ s2ï¼ˆæ¯ä¸ªæœ€å¤š 100 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦é•¿ï¼‰å’Œä¸¤ä¸ªæ•´æ•° 0 â‰¤ n1 â‰¤ 106 å’Œ 1 â‰¤ n2 â‰¤ 106ã€‚ç°åœ¨è€ƒè™‘å­—ç¬¦ä¸² S1 å’Œ S2ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ S1=[s1,n1] ã€S2=[s2,n2] ã€‚

class Solution
{
public:
    int getMaxRepetitions(string s1, int n1, string s2, int n2)
    {
        if (n1 == 0)
            return 0;
        int s1cnt = 0, s2cnt = 0, index = 0;

        // mp[index]={s1cnt,s2cnt}è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œç¬¬indexä¸ªå­—ç¬¦åœ¨éå†s1cntæ¬¡s1å’Œs2cntæ¬¡s2å‡ºç°çš„
        unordered_map<int, pair<int, int>> mp;
        pair<int, int> pre, in;
        while (1)
        {
            s1cnt++;
            for (char ch : s1)
            {
                if (ch == s2[index])
                {
                    index++;
                    if (index == s2.size())
                    {
                        s2cnt++;
                        index = 0;
                    }
                }
            }
            // æ²¡æ‰¾åˆ°å¾ªç¯èŠ‚ï¼Œs1æ²¡äº†
            if (s1cnt == n1)
                return s2cnt / n2;

            if (mp.count(index))
            {
                auto [a, b] = mp[index];
                pre = {a, b};
                // æœ‰å¾ªç¯èŠ‚,ä»¥åçš„æ¯ (s1cnt-a)ä¸ªs1ä¸­åŒ…å«äº†(s2cnt-b)ä¸ªs2
                in = {s1cnt - a, s2cnt - b};
                break;
            }
            else
                mp[index] = {s1cnt, s2cnt};
        }
        int ans = pre.second + (n1 - pre.first) / in.first * in.second;
        // åŒ¹é…s1æœ«å°¾å‰©ä¸‹çš„
        int rest = (n1 - pre.first) % in.first;
        for (int i = 0; i < rest; ++i)
        {
            for (char ch : s1)
            {
                if (ch == s2[index])
                {
                    ++index;
                    if (index == s2.size())
                    {
                        ++ans;
                        index = 0;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        return ans / n2;
    }
};

class Solution
{
public:
    int maxArea(vector<int> &height)
    {
        // s = (r-l)*min(a[l],a[r]) ,æ±‚  max(s)
        int maxx = 0, l = 0, r = height.size() - 1;
        while (r - l >= 1)
        {
            int s = (r - l) * min(height[l], height[r]);
            maxx = max(maxx, s);
            if (height[l] > height[r])
                r--;
            else
                l++;
        }
        return maxx;
    }
};

class Solution
{
public:
    bool canJump(vector<int> &nums)
    {
        int limit_pos = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++)
        {
            if (i > limit_pos)
                return false;
            limit_pos = max(limit_pos, i + nums[i]);
        }
        return true;
    }
};

æ€è·¯

ä¸€ä¸ªå°è´ªå¿ƒï¼ŒæŠŠåŒºé—´æŒ‰ç…§å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹æ’åºã€‚åˆå§‹å€¼è®¾ç½®ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´çš„å·¦å’Œå³ã€‚

ç„¶åéå†æ’åºå¥½çš„åŒºé—´ï¼Œå¦‚æœéå†åˆ°çš„åŒºé—´å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹å°äºç­‰äºrï¼Œå°±æ‰©å±•rï¼Œç­‰åˆ°ä¸æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶æ—¶è¯æ˜è¿™ä¸ªåŒºé—´æœ€å¤šå°±åŒ…å«è¿™ä¹ˆå¤šï¼Œç»§ç»­ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´å³å¯ã€‚

class Solution
{
public:
    static bool cmp(pair<int, int> a, pair<int, int> b)
    {
        return a.first < b.first;
    }
    vector<vector<int>> merge(vector<vector<int>> &intervals)
    {
        vector<vector<int>> ans;
        if (intervals.size() == 0)
            return ans;
        vector<pair<int, int>> v;
        for (auto interval : intervals)
            v.push_back({interval[0], interval[1]});
        sort(v.begin(), v.end(), cmp);
        auto [l, r] = v[0];
        for (int i = 1; i < v.size(); i++)
        {
            if (v[i].first <= r)
                r = max(r, v[i].second);
            else
            {
                ans.push_back({l, r});
                l = v[i].first;
                r = v[i].second;
            }
        }
        ans.push_back({l, r});
        return ans;
    }
};

å¹¿æœBFSï¼Œå’Œ 1162 åœ°å›¾åˆ†ææœ‰ç‚¹åƒï¼Œé¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚å‡ºæ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¸0æœ€è¿‘çš„è·ç¦»æ˜¯å¤šå°‘ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸ç”¨é—®ï¼Œè‚¯å®šå€¼ä¸º0çš„ç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»è¿˜æ˜¯0ï¼Œå…¶ä½™çš„å¯ä»¥æœå‡ºæ¥ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆæŠŠå€¼ä¸º0çš„åæ ‡å…¨éƒ¨å…¥é˜Ÿï¼Œåƒå››ä¸ªæ–¹å‘æœç´¢ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯1ï¼Œå½“å‰çš„æ­¥æ•°å°±+1ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯0ï¼Œé‚£æ­¥æ•°ä¸å˜ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦åœ¨æœç´¢çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¸€ç›´ç»™ç­”æ¡ˆçš„è·ç¦»ä¸å½“å‰æ­¥æ•°å–æœ€å°å€¼å³å¯ã€‚

class Solution
{
public:
    struct node
    {
        int x, y, step;
    };
    int go[4][2] = {1, 0, -1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1};
    vector<vector<int>> updateMatrix(vector<vector<int>> &matrix)
    {
        int n = matrix.size(), m = matrix[0].size();
        vector<vector<int>> result(n, vector<int>(m, 99999));
        vector<vector<int>> vis(n + 1, vector<int>(m + 1, 0));
        queue<node> q;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            for (int j = 0; j < m; j++)
                if (matrix[i][j] == 0)
                {
                    q.push({i, j, 0});
                    vis[i][j] = 1;
                }
        while (!q.empty())
        {
            node now = q.front();
            q.pop();
            result[now.x][now.y] = min(result[now.x][now.y], now.step);
            for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
            {
                int xx = now.x + go[i][0];
                int yy = now.y + go[i][1];
                if (xx >= 0 && xx < n && yy >= 0 && yy < m && !vis[xx][yy])
                {
                    if (matrix[xx][yy] == 1)
                        q.push({xx, yy, now.step + 1});
                    else
                        q.push({xx, yy, now.step});
                    vis[xx][yy] = 1;
                }
            }
        }
        return result;
    }
};

ä»¤dp[t][n]ä»£è¡¨ï¼šæœ‰tå±‚æ¥¼ï¼Œnä¸ªé¸¡è›‹ï¼Œæœ€å°‘è¦æ‰”å¤šå°‘æ¬¡æ‰å¯ä»¥ç¡®å®šä¸´ç•Œå€¼ã€‚ç°åœ¨å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªk (1<=k<=t)ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä»ç¬¬kå±‚æ‰”ä¸‹å»ä¸€ä¸ªé¸¡è›‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœé¸¡è›‹ç¢äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±è¦å¾€ä½ä¸€ç‚¹çš„æ¥¼å±‚å»æ‰¾ï¼Œåˆ™å½“å‰dp[t][n]çŠ¶æ€æ˜¯dp[k-1][n-1]+1(k-1çš„åŸå› æ˜¯ç¬¬kå±‚å·²ç»æ‰”è¿‡äº†)ï¼Œå¦‚æœé¸¡è›‹æ²¡ç¢ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¦å‘ä¸Šæ‰¾ï¼Œå½“å‰çš„çŠ¶æ€dp[t][n]ç­‰ä»·äºdp[t-k][n]+1ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆé—®é¢˜æ¥äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªkæ²¡æœ‰ç¡®å®šï¼Œkçš„å–å€¼èŒƒå›´æ˜¯(1<=k<=t)ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å½“ç„¶å¯ä»¥æšä¸¾ä¸€ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰çš„kï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨æ‰€æœ‰çš„kä¸­å–æœ€å°å€¼(å› ä¸ºé¢˜ç›®æ±‚çš„æ˜¯æœ€å°ç§»åŠ¨æ¬¡æ•°)ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ¯æ¬¡æšä¸¾å…¨éƒ¨çš„kï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦æ¯”è¾ƒé«˜$O(KN^2)$ã€‚

äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ç”¨äºŒåˆ†æ¥ç¡®å®škï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è§‚å¯Ÿä¸Šé¢çš„çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š

  • dp[k-1][n-1],kå¢å¤§çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ¥¼å±‚è¶Šé«˜ï¼Œåˆ™å€¼è¶Šå¤§
  • dp[t-k][n]ï¼Œkå¢å¤§çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ¥¼å±‚è¶Šå°ï¼Œå€¼è¶Šå°

æ‰€ä»¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯å•è°ƒé€’å¢çš„ï¼Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯å•è°ƒé€’å‡çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬è¦ç¡®å®šçš„kåœ¨ä»–ä»¬çš„äº¤æ±‡ç‚¹ã€‚ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ‰¾åˆ°ä½¿å¾—dp[t-k][n]<=dp[t-1][n-1]çš„æœ€å¤§çš„kã€‚ç”¨äº†äºŒåˆ†ä¹‹åçš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦é™ä¸ºï¼š$O(KNlogN)$

æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼šdp

å®šä¹‰dp[k][step]ä»£è¡¨ç”±kä¸ªé¸¡è›‹ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ç§»åŠ¨stepæ­¥æ‰€èƒ½åˆ°è¾¾çš„ç¡®å®šçš„æœ€å¤§æ¥¼å±‚ã€‚åˆ™æ˜“å¾—

  • dp[k][1]=1 ï¼šä¸è®ºæœ‰å¤šå°‘ä¸ªé¸¡è›‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¹‹èµ°ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåªèƒ½ç¡®å®šæœ€å¤§1å±‚æ¥¼ã€‚
  • dp[1][step]=stepï¼šåªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé¸¡è›‹æ—¶ï¼Œèƒ½èµ°åˆ°çš„æœ€å¤§æ¥¼å±‚åªèƒ½1å±‚ä¸€å±‚è¯•ï¼Œéœ€è¦stepæ¬¡æ•°ã€‚

$$dp[k][step]=dp[k-1][step-1]+dp[k][step-1]+1$$

è¡¨ç¤ºï¼šå½“å‰æ¥¼å±‚æœ‰kä¸ªé¸¡è›‹ï¼Œèµ°äº†stepæ­¥èƒ½ç¡®å®šçš„æœ€å¤§æ¥¼å±‚æ•°é‡æ˜¯ï¼Œä¸¢äº†é¸¡è›‹ç¢äº†èµ°ä¸€æ­¥èƒ½ç¡®å®šçš„æœ€å¤§æ¥¼å±‚(dp[k-1][step-1])+ä¸¢äº†é¸¡è›‹æ²¡ç¢èµ°ä¸€æ­¥æ‰€èƒ½ç¡®å®šçš„æœ€å¤§æ¥¼å±‚(dp[k][step-1])+å½“å‰è¿™ä¸€å±‚ä¸¢äº†é¸¡è›‹åªèƒ½ç¡®å®šçš„å±‚æ•°1.æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºï¼š$O(K*N)$

class Solution
{
public:
    // è¿”å›æœ‰tå±‚ï¼Œnä¸ªé¸¡è›‹çš„æœ€å°ç§»åŠ¨æ¬¡æ•°,kæ˜¯æšä¸¾çš„ä¸­é—´æ¥¼å±‚
    int dp[10000 + 50][100 + 50];
    int dfs(int t, int n)
    {
        if (~dp[t][n])
            return dp[t][n];
        if (t == 0 || n == 0)
            return 0;
        if (n == 1)
            return t;
        if (t == 1)
            return 1;
        int minn = INT_MAX;
        for (int k = 1; k <= t; k++)
        {
            minn = min(minn, max(dfs(k - 1, n - 1), dfs(t - k, n)) + 1);
        }
        return dp[t][n] = minn;
    }
    // K ä»£è¡¨é¸¡è›‹ä¸ªæ•°ï¼ŒN ä»£è¡¨æ¥¼å±‚æ•°
    int superEggDrop(int K, int N)
    {
        memset(dp, -1, sizeof(dp));
        return dfs(N, K);
    }
};

class Solution
{
public:
    // è¿”å›æœ‰tå±‚ï¼Œnä¸ªé¸¡è›‹çš„æœ€å°ç§»åŠ¨æ¬¡æ•°,kæ˜¯æšä¸¾çš„ä¸­é—´æ¥¼å±‚
    int dp[10000 + 50][100 + 50];
    int dfs(int t, int n)
    {
        if (~dp[t][n])
            return dp[t][n];
        if (t == 0 || n == 0)
            return 0;
        if (n == 1)
            return t;
        if (t == 1)
            return 1;
        int l = 1, r = t;
        while (r - l > 1)
        {
            int mid = (l + r) >> 1;
            int ans1 = dfs(mid - 1, n - 1);
            int ans2 = dfs(t - mid, n);
            if (ans1 < ans2)
                l = mid;
            else if (ans1 > ans2)
                r = mid;
            else
                l = r = mid;
        }
        return dp[t][n] = 1 + min(max(dfs(l - 1, n - 1), dfs(t - l, n)),
                                  max(dfs(r - 1, n - 1), dfs(t - r, n)));
    }
    // K ä»£è¡¨é¸¡è›‹ä¸ªæ•°ï¼ŒN ä»£è¡¨æ¥¼å±‚æ•°
    int superEggDrop(int K, int N)
    {
        memset(dp, -1, sizeof(dp));
        return dfs(N, K);
    }
};

class Solution
{
public:
    // Kä¸ªé¸¡è›‹ï¼ŒNå±‚æ¥¼
    int superEggDrop(int K, int N)
    {
        // dp[k][step]è¡¨ç¤ºç»™kä¸ªé¸¡è›‹ï¼Œç§»åŠ¨stepæ­¥æ‰€èƒ½è¾¾åˆ°çš„æœ€å¤§å±‚æ•°
        vector<vector<int>> dp(K + 1, vector<int>(N + 1, 0));
        for (int step = 1; step < N; step++)
        {
            dp[0][step] = 0;
            for (int k = 1; k <= K; k++)
            {
                dp[k][step] = dp[k][step - 1] + dp[k - 1][step - 1] + 1;
                if (dp[k][step] >= N)
                    return step;
            }
        }
        return N;
    }
};
